STTNJ

We're a student-run organization teaching Comp Sci, Coding, & Robotics

Free Coding Workshops

A series of free online coding workshops for middle school students.

In-School Hackathons

STTNJ hosts in-person Hackathons at local schools. A Hackathon is a fun event/competition where participants have limited time to build a project, like an app, website, game, or robot.

Summer Courses

Free in-person & online summer courses for middle school students. Topics include web development, robotics, game devlopment, artificial intelligence, & more.
